dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Squish... invade my domain do you? Gorath loathes intruders...

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, ooze. I'm not here for you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath squelches at your arrogance. You dare dismiss the might of Gorath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You're a mere obstacle. I will wipe you away.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words. Gorath will enjoy devouring your flesh!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be annihilated!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath hungers for battle. Onward to your doom!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fear not the dark. It only makes me stronger.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath will relish breaking you, piece by piece.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm just passing through. Stay out of my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath cares not for your passage. Trouble me and you will regret it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am no mere traveler. I am your doom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath will smother you in agony!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then stay out of mine, ooze. This is a warning.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath sees nothing worth challenging. Go, before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You wouldn't want to fight someone like me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath fears nothing, least of all you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let's see who's stronger.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath welcomes your futile struggle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps you are wise. But I am merciless.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mercy is for the weak. Gorath will consume you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I've heard of your might, Gorath. Join me and you will be rewarded.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bah, Gorath holds no interest in your empty promises.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you dare refuse the Shadow Conqueror?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath sees only an inflated ego. Prove your worth or be devoured.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then face my power, ooze.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath is ready to crush you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. Align with me or perish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath remains unfazed. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Reconsider. I offer power beyond imagining.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath doubts your sincerity. Prove your strength, or begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be obliterated, fool.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath will feast on your remains.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You've made a grave mistake, Gorath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath tires of your threats. I will devour you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will regret this. You could have had it all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath has no need of your baubles. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll show you why I am feared.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath welcomes your challenge!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A pity. You had potential.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Spare me your pity. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside or face the darkness within me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath is not frightened by shadows. Show your worth!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am the Dark Warlock, master of shadows. You cannot withstand me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath sifts through your boasts. Prove it, or die.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be eradicated!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath awaits your futile attempts.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness consumes everything. Even you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath fears no darkness. Come and try.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You are but a speck in my path to power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath detests being called a mere speck. Enough talk!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Are you ready to be obliterated?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath will engulf you whole!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will pay for your insolence, ooze.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath shows no mercy, nor will he receive it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Defy me, and you will face annihilation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath shrugs at annihilation. Your threats are meaningless.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You'll wish you heeded my warning.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath takes no heed. You will regret this.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The time for words is over. Prepare to die.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gorath is ready. Come, and meet your end!
